trans-unit.source: Used internally as the class that represents metadata about an individual configuration property.
<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> is used to describe settings properties of a class derived from <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase>.
The Settings API allows a collection of settings properties to be grouped into a common language runtime class.

When persisting settings, the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> base class asks for a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> objects, grouped in a collection of type <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection>.
It does this by calling its own Properties member.
Inherited classes should return a collection of properties to persist.
Each <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> object includes metadata about the property, including the following:
Name.
Default value.
Property type.
Serialization method.
Provider to use for persistence.
Other arbitrary attributes that are context and provider specific.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> class, based on the supplied parameter.
Specifies a copy of an existing <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> class.
based on the supplied parameter.
Specifies the name of an existing <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> class based on the supplied parameters.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
The type of <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProvider"></xref> object to use for persistence.
A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object is read-only.
The default value of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsSerializeAs"></xref> object.
This object is an enumeration used to set the serialization scheme for storing application settings.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsAttributeDictionary"></xref> object.
A Boolean value specifying whether an error will be thrown when the property is unsuccessfully deserialized.
A Boolean value specifying whether an error will be thrown when the property is unsuccessfully serialized.
Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsAttributeDictionary"></xref> object containing the attributes of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
Returns a collection of attributes used to describe a <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> object.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsAttributeDictionary"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the default value of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
An object containing the default value of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object.
Gets or sets a value specifying whether a <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> object is read-only.
The default is `false`.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty.Name%2A> cannot be an empty string or `null`.
If the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty> does not exist in the data provider, nothing can be returned.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref>.
Gets or sets the type for the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref>.
The type for the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref>.
Gets or sets the provider for the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProvider"></xref> object.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsSerializeAs"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsSerializeAs> object is an enumeration used as the serialization scheme to store application settings.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsSerializeAs"></xref> object.
Gets or sets a value specifying whether an error will be thrown when the property is unsuccessfully deserialized.
`true` if the error will be thrown when the property is unsuccessfully deserialized; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a value specifying whether an error will be thrown when the property is unsuccessfully serialized.
`true` if the error will be thrown when the property is unsuccessfully serialized; otherwise, `false`.
